name: Business Hunter
tag_list: innovation, software-development, software-factory, business-development, professional-service, head-hunting
overview:
Business Hunter is a Global provider of comprehensive solutions. Their Lines of Business are; Professional Services, Software Factory, Head Hunting, Digital Marketing and Business Development. Their offerings are business IT focused, they drive real and tangible value.

Business Hunter objective is to collaborate so that their clients obtain a major value of the implementation of technological solutions world-class, reducing its costs and increasing the return of its investment in IT.

Their vision is to offer an unique experience to their clients, mobilizing their capacities and talents to accompany them in the achievement of their Business by means of the creativity and the innovation.

Business Hunter commit theirselves to use the highest quality standards, applying better practices to reduce risks, lower the working time and diminish the total cost of property.

          - Think big
          - Innovate
          - Aim to excellence in our work

          - Have fun
